0.title: How They Got Here

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

0.plot: Get the tea on all the glamorous galas, scintillating scandals and enormous egos as the Housewives navigate the social scene of the city's elite, all while juggling husbands, boyfriends, careers, and families.

1.title: Your Amygdala is Showing

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

1.plot: After trying unsuccessfully for a third child last season, Brandi has adopted a baby boy named Bruin. LeeAnne begins trying to meditate away her anger, blaming her enlarged amygdala as the source of her sour disposition. Cary has opened a new laser center and started major renovations on her home forcing her to live with her parents until the job is completed. Kameron's husband Court gives her an ultimatum: find a distributor for her "Sparkle Dog" pet food, or give it up. Cary and LeeAnne arrange a summit to settle their differences, while Stephanie begins to see ...

2.title: Bubbles and Brooding

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

2.plot: Stephanie and LeeAnne make a startling connection at D'Andra's anniversary party. D'Andra and Mama Dee come to a head over the future of their business, bringing their relationship to the brink of destruction. Meanwhile, Cary lives in her parents' house which causes unpleasant childhood memories of familial struggles to resurface. LeeAnne embarks on a transformational fashion venture, while Brandi finds that she has her hands full with Brooklyn, Brinkley and baby Bruin, as she tries to manage her new role as a mom of three. Stephanie hosts a "Bubbles and Bru" party ...

3.title: The Badger of Beaver Creek

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

3.plot: Kameron puts aside her own dismay and carries on the good vibes after Brandi's surprise baby reveal party. She invites everyone to fly to Colorado on The Wescott's private jet to stay at their luxury home in Beaver Creek. Not wanting to offend Kameron, Stephanie agrees to join the ladies for two days before she meets up with her husband and children in Italy. D'Andra and Brandi put their social-media squabble on ice for the weekend. Kameron wants to show Brandi and Stephanie her wild side, so she does her best to loosen up with all the girls over a lively dinner at ...

4.title: God Save The Queen, Bitch

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

4.plot: The Beaver Creek trip continues, as Kameron and Stephanie feud over a miscommunication regarding Brandi's adopted baby. Cary tries to calm Kameron down but it's no use. During a tense van ride to the snowmobiles, LeeAnne advises Kameron to listen to Stephanie's intentions and not her words, which clears the air. At the top of the mountain, D'Andra ends her longstanding feud with Brandi by apologizing for her offensive comments. Brandi and D'Andra become fast friends, inventing their own specialty shot: "The Spitfire". At the final dinner, Brandi pits D'Andra against ...

5.title: Rodeo Barbie

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

5.plot: LeeAnne and Rich settle their marriage woes and vow to start the wedding planning process. Kameron prepares for the Global Pet Expo, despite her children's disapproval. Brandi plans a rodeo adventure for new bestie D'Andra's birthday, but things get heated when D'Andra's social status is called into question. Meanwhile, Cary and Stephanie return from their respective vacations too late and miss all the rodeo shenanigans, including Brandi surprising D'Andra with a special gift, and a possessive LeeAnne giving D'Andra a lap dance. Cary checks on her home renovation and ...

6.title: Smashing Friendships

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

6.plot: Brandi gets a stressful visit from the social workers as they do their monthly assessment of her household. Kameron's only worries are about flying commercial, as she leaves for the pet expo in Orlando. Meanwhile, D'Andra gets closer to breaking away from her mother's company and LeeAnne dispenses a dose of tough love about how to downsize her fancy Dallas lifestyle. When D'Andra hears from Cary that LeeAnne has been discussing her personal finances, the humiliation becomes too much for D'andra to bear and she drops the hammer during LeeAnne's "Smash Party."

7.title: Babes in Brandiland

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

7.plot: Brandi invites all of the ladies to sip n' spend at her Brandiland pop-up shop. Stephanie encourages the women to focus on self-care and hosts an epic spa day at her newly remodeled home. LeeAnne takes "L'Infinite" dress to the next level by modeling it in a special stop-motion photoshoot, while Kameron faces off with Court in a fight for the future of Sparkle Dog. D'Andra confronts LeeAnne about spreading rumours about her finances and Cary tells Kameron about a secret gag gift that sends Brandi over the edge.

8.title: Off the Leash

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

8.plot: Despite LeeAnne's tepid apology to D'Andra at Brandi's event, these two former besties currently remain frenemies. LeeAnne tries to move forward with her wedding plans, but struggles without D'Andra by her side. Meanwhile, D'Andra gets some startling news when she finally meets with Mama Dee to discuss the future of their company. Brandi gets a nanny, and Cary stirs the pot at Kameron's "Paint Your Dog" party. LeeAnne and D'Andra sit down to clear the air, but when LeeAnne refuses to open up about her relationship with Rich, D'Andra reveals a shocking rumor.

9.title: '80s Ladies

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Are You Saying I'm An Alcoholic?

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

10.plot: LeeAnne tells Rich about her heated conversation with D'Andra. Mama Dee tells D'Andra to stop worrying about LeeAnne's wedding and pay more attention to the skin care empire she's about to take over. A visit from Stephanie's older sister puts everything in perspective for her regarding Travis leaving for Harvard, while Brandi and Bryan share an intimate moment with their new baby boy. Cary hosts a grand opening event at her Laser Center where LeeAnne expresses concern to D'Andra about her drinking. Brandi accuses LeeAnne of being friends with Stephanie just to get to ...

11.title: A Recipe for Disaster

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

11.plot: Mama Dee invites Kameron, LeeAnne and D'Andra for a day of Southern cooking at the lake, but Kameron's mother-in-law, offers D'Andra some hard-to-stomach advice that leads to an ugly showdown.

12.title: Where's Copenhagen?

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

12.plot: Cary invites all the ladies to join her for a trip to Denmark. D'Andra gets a pep talk from Mama Dee about how to handle Kameron and LeeAnne, while LeeAnne goes wedding dress shopping. Stephanie and Travis renew their vows and D'Andra hosts a pop-up event for her company, at which Brandi finds out what LeeAnne called her. The ladies fly off to Denmark, wondering if they'll be able to put their differences aside.

13.title: Something is Rotten in Denmark

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

13.plot: Cary takes all the ladies to Copenhagen, Denmark to visit her relatives. The trip instantly takes a turn when D'Andra gets into heated arguments with both Kameron and LeeAnne. The drama continues when Brandi's plan to get LeeAnne to admit she called her an alcoholic goes terribly wrong in the middle of a Michelin Star restaurant. Stephanie tries to broker a peace treaty between D'Andra and LeeAnne, and after a concert given by Cary's cousins, Brandi confronts LeeAnne head-on about the accusations.

14.title: Growers and Show-ers

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

14.plot: The trip to Copenhagen continues with Brandi confronting LeeAnne about the alcoholic accusations, and D'Andra apologizing to Kameron for their fight the night before.

15.title: Game of Phones

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

15.plot: The trip to Denmark ends with Brandi storming off from their final dinner, and D'Andra following close behind, leaving LeeAnne playing second fiddle to Brandi.

16.title: Party Fouls

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

16.plot: On the season finale of The Real Housewives of Dallas, LeeAnne picks a church and a date for her wedding, while Mama Dee officially signs over her company to D'Andra. Stephanie throws a college kegger for her husband Travis who is about to leave for Business school. There's plenty of fun to be had playing beer pong, doing keg stands, and playing in a giant foam pit, but this kegger takes a turn when a conflict between LeeAnne and Brandi escalates.

17.title: Reunion Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

17.plot:

18.title: Reunion Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

1.title: Everything's Bigger in Dallas

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

1.plot: Everything's bigger in Dallas - the egos, the attitudes, and the bank accounts. Cary hosts a benefit at her home where inappropriate behavior by best friends Brandi and Stephanie raises the ire of social maven, LeeAnne. Later, tensions boil over at a prestigious charity event as Stephanie is dragged into a feud between Brandi and LeeAnne. Meanwhile, Leanne's best friend, Tiffany, questions whether her recent move back to Dallas from Los Angeles was the right decision for her and her rocker husband, Aaron.

2.title: Mad as a Hatter

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

2.plot: LeeAnne enlists the help of a Dallas designer to create a hat for the Mad Hatter's Tea Party, one of the most coveted events on the Dallas social calendar. Brandi struggles with her husband Bryan's constant business travel as she hosts a birthday party for her mother. Later, Stephanie and Cary are dragged deeper into Brandi's conflict with LeeAnne when Brandi arrives to the Mad Hatter's Tea Party donning a hat decorated with a special surprise.

3.title: Making Frenemies

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

3.plot: Tiffany features Cary's closet in her web series and discovers a shocking revelation about Mark. Meanwhile, Brandi deals with fallout from Bryan after her alcohol-infused episode at a male strip club and LeeAnne invites Stephanie and Cary to lunch to address Brandi's behavior at the Mad Hatter's Tea Party. Later, Brandi's mother shares a family secret causing Brandi to question everything.

4.title: Mouth of the South

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

4.plot: Stephanie and Brandi visit Stephanie's parents in Oklahoma. Back in Dallas, Cary takes another step toward building a friendship with Tiffany and extends an invite to join her for yoga. Later, Marie hosts a lavish cocktail party where an embarrassing revelation about LeeAnne comes to light. Tiffany's effort to broker peace between Brandi and LeeAnne backfires with disastrous results.

5.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner?

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

5.plot: Tiffany's effort to play peacemaker with LeeAnne and Brandi fails, causing Tiffany and LeeAnne to clash. Meanwhile, Travis buys Stephanie's affection with major bling to commemorate their anniversary. After receiving a champagne shower from LeeAnne, Cary receives a fabulous surprise gift from Mark. Brandi is devastated when Bryan bails on a barbecue she hosts for her estranged grandfather.

6.title: Locken Loaded

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

6.plot: LeeAnne and Tiffany confront Marie after Tiffany reveals that Marie has been spreading gossip behind LeeAnne's back. Travis tries to micromanage Stephanie's plans to redecorate four-year-old Cruz's bedroom, while Mark captures risqué photos of Cary for their website in a bid to attract more business. Tensions rise between Brandi and Bryan when she confronts him about blowing off the barbecue she hosted for her estranged grandfather.

7.title: Black and Blues

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

7.plot: Tiffany attempts to solidify her standing in Dallas by throwing a charity concert with her rocker husband Aaron at the House of Blues. Brandi is shaken by traumatic news about her younger brother Michael. LeeAnne and Stephanie meet in an attempt to reconcile differences. Cary's apprehensions about LeeAnne grow at a gothic-themed party.

8.title: Hollman Holiday

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

8.plot: Stephanie struggles when Travis tries to hijack the planning of his own birthday party. Brandi and LeeAnne break bread to see if they can find common ground. Cary chastises Mark for overspending on extravagant gifts for three-year-old Zuri's birthday. Tiffany and Stephanie watch LeeAnne take center stage as the keynote speaker for a charity event supporting women with HIV.

9.title: Killing Time in Austin

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

9.plot: The ladies head to Brandi and Stephanie's lake house in Austin for a fun getaway. LeeAnne is shocked to learn that everyone is "in" on the details of a secret from her past. The next morning, Cary and Stephanie engage in a heated confrontation with LeeAnne, in the aftermath of a horrific late night fight they overheard.

10.title: The Full Nelson

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

10.plot: Stephanie hosts her annual Byron Nelson party, an all-day drinking extravaganza celebrating a golf tournament. Tiffany gets a lead on a hot new home and tries to convince Aaron to settle down in Dallas. Meanwhile, Cary and Mark make their summer plans and LeeAnne explores the possibility of pursuing a career as a public speaker. Stephanie's party isn't safe from drama as Cary and LeeAnne clash, leaving a fractured group of friends in their wake.

11.title: Reunion

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

11.plot: Bravo Media's The Real Housewives of Dallas brings big drama from the big D on a supersized reunion. For their first rodeo, Andy Cohen sits down with Cary Deuber, Tiffany Hendra, Stephanie Hollman, LeeAnne Locken, Brandi Redmond, their friend Marie Reyes and Cary's husband Mark Deuber, to rehash the season's most memorable and difficult moments. In the supersized reunion, Brandi divulges a painful secret about her marriage to Bryan, while Stephanie sets the record straight on Travis's to-do list. Cary and Mark confront LeeAnne about the scandalous rumor she spread ...

1.title: Look Who's Not Talking

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

1.plot: The housewives take sides as Brandi and Stephanie reveal a feud that has ended their friendship. And who of all people has become Brandi's friend and confidante, but LeeAnne Locken. An old police report about LeeAnne's past resurfaces. And everything comes to a head at Cary's birthday party for Mark, where Brandi and Stephanie come face to face as two new housewives join.

2.title: Haute Dogs of Dallas

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

2.plot: Stephanie makes a play to put a crack in Brandi's newfound friendship with LeeAnne, but it backfires turning Cary and LeeAnne against her. Meanwhile, Travis drops millions on a house in the city, but Stephanie is the last to know. D'Andra makes moves towards taking over her mother's cosmetics business, but it won't be easy. And fur flies when Brandi and Stephanie meet again at the Howl-O-Ween dog costume contest.

3.title: Face to Two Face

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

3.plot: Brandi and Stephanie make an attempt to repair their broken friendship, but after so much damage, it may be too late. With no experience parenting, D'Andra tries her best not to be an evil stepmother when Jeremy's 20-year-old son moves in. And LeeAnne's latest anger management session doesn't prevent her from showing up at Stephanie's Halloween party dressed to kill.

4.title: By Invitation Only

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

4.plot: Stephanie draws a line in the sand with Travis about the expensive renovations. LeeAnne shows potential as a role model, until Brandi overhears her gossiping. D'Andra demands to know when her mother will finally turn over the family business and is surprised when she hears the real reason. When Brandi invites Cary and Stephanie to Memphis right in front of Kameron, it sparks a fight.

5.title: Walking in Memphis

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

5.plot: Kameron presents a bright pink business idea to her very skeptical husband, while Cary and Stephanie embark on Brandi's family trip to Memphis. LeeAnne is left behind and crushed to find she's not as close to Brandi as she thought.

6.title: Don't Cry Over Spilled Tea

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

6.plot: LeeAnne gets a stunning surprise from Rich at the Texas State Fair. D'Andra decides to call an "Honestea" at her house where she'll use a teapot, some notes, and a gavel to coerce her beloved back-talking bitches to get their issues out on the table and move on. But a little too much honesty threatens to send the teacakes flying.

7.title: Viva La Mexico

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

7.plot: As housewives shop, pack and prepare for their much-needed getaway to Mexico, Kameron's irresistible pink charm wins Court over and he agrees to invest startup funding in her dog gone business idea. Mark is not taking it well that Cary is spending less time as his nurse and more time with their daughter Zuri.

8.title: A Mouthful in Mexico

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

8.plot: The forecast for Playa Del Carmen, Mexico says plenty of sun and tequila, until Brandi pushes Kameron overboard with an "impressive" novelty. LeeAnne shares exhilarating news about her relationship with Rich. And at an exotic underground cave dinner, Cary confronts LeeAnne about her dangerous threat, unleashing crossfire of accusations and denials between the wives.

9.title: You've Yacht to Be Kidding

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

9.plot: More sun and tequila as the housewives keep the party going in the Mayan Riviera, Mexico. Brandi and Stephanie go undercover disguised as LeeAnne and D'Andra to swindle their room key in search of the "toy" that Kameron just loves to hate. And it's anchors away when their grand finale yacht trip sails into stormy waters as the truth comes out about vicious rumors LeeAnne and Cary have leveled at each other's husbands.

10.title: Don't Cry Over Shattered Glass

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

10.plot: It's Brandi's annual holiday party and she finds herself center of the drama when LeeAnne reveals that Cary can't be friends with her and Stephanie anymore because of their behavior in Mexico. And when Brandi challenges her for an explanation, Cary sides with Kameron, infuriating Brandi so much, she blurts out a humiliating secret about Cary and Mark.

11.title: Ladies Who Launch

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

11.plot: It's almost time for Kameron's Sparkle Dog Launch Party and Dallas' who's who and best in show are dressed to the canines to step and repeat, get their first taste of the bright pink kibble, and even stop at the Pet Psychic for a quick read. But before we get there, D'Andra has a meeting at the cosmetics lab only to find out the main ingredient for her new snow algae skin care product won't make the launch deadline, which will jeopardize Dee's final decision to hand over the company.

12.title: The Beginning of the End

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

12.plot: It's LeeAnne and Rich's engagement party and everyone is coming, even LeeAnne's mother, just in time to try and resolve a lifelong misunderstanding. D'Andra must face Dee and accept the consequences of failing to complete her new product on time.

13.title: Reunion Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

13.plot: Cary and Brandi lock horns over plastic surgery allegations while a mystery guest causes LeeAnne to be anything but quiet on the set. Stephanie gives her two cents on Two-Face.

14.title: Reunion Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas (TV Series 2016–2018)

14.plot: The two part reunion concludes with Cary and Mark addressing the rumors about their marriage, D'Andra and Kameron's biggest regrets about their first season, Stephanie's concerns regarding a future with Brandi, and LeeAnne's revelation about who will be receiving an invite to her wedding.

imdb.plot outline: A natural expansion for "The Real Housewives" franchise, the extravagant, over-the-top city of Dallas is deeply rooted in Texan pride, where people believe that if they are lucky enough to live in the Lone Star State, they are lucky enough.
imdb.title: The Real Housewives of Dallas
akas: The Real Housewives of Dallas (United States)
plot: A natural expansion for "The Real Housewives" franchise, the extravagant, over-the-top city of Dallas is deeply rooted in Texan pride, where people believe that if they are lucky enough to live in the Lone Star State, they are lucky enough.
